title: How to get your OpenZoo Xmas promo
author: gaichu
excerpt: Weâ€™re running a fun holiday OpenZoo promotion all December.
body_html:
Weâ€™re running a fun holiday OpenZoo promotion all December. Hereâ€™s how to get your free Christmas Waheela promo card.

1. Send a holiday card to the Gaichu PO box anytime in December 2025. If it arrives a little late, thatâ€™s fine.

2. Include your name and mailing address. Iâ€™ll use this to send your promo card.

3. Youâ€™re done.

Mail your holiday cards to:

  • Gaichu
  • 26400 NE Valley St #643
  • Duvall, WA

All promo cards are printed and cut at Gaichu HQ (Gaiyaya). Expect a few rare variants to sneak in... including playtester and sample cards. Have you been a good boy this year?

See Christmas Waheela on the OpenZoo database.
